mail )} ) } export default MailCompte function Formulaire({ account }) { const inputStyle = 'h-8 bg-light-blue rounded-md w-full outline-blue px-2 py-1 text-grey' const labelStyle = 'font-bold py-1 text-grey' const [status, setStatus] = useState(account.status) const [name, setName] = useState(account.name) const [email, setEmail] = useState(account.email) const [tel, setTel] = useState(account.tel) const [password, setPassword] = useState(account.password) const date = `${new Date().getDate()}/${new Date().getMonth() + 1}/${new Date().getFullYear()}` const [newInfos, setNewInfos] = useState(account) useEffect(() => { setNewInfos({ ...newInfos, status, name, email, tel, password, date }) }, [status, name, email, tel, password, date]) return (
